message.body: Hi Julia it looks like there's a good chance it's going to be stormy tomorrow morning
Depending on what the weather is I might still try to ride but I bet I won't be good for going out for a hack
How flexible is your schedule tomorrow
Ha, I was just gonna text you & say it looks rainy! So I'm pretty free tomorrow - could try to hack later or another time this weekend.
I'd like to get then both ridden if possible so I'll probably check the radar tomorrow. Oh and what's the name of the place tomorrow evening? 7ish, right?
I will text you in the AM. I am thinking I am going to get up early work and try to ride later between storms
Ok, see you tomorrow one way or the other!
FYI Tnaya and crew likes to wear dresses :)
Thinking I might try to ride at mid morning I am feeling bit sluggish now call when you feel like going
I'm editing away, will probably head out...10 or 11ish? Kind of open! The forecast is useless, 50% chance of rain all day. Oh and good to know about dresses, thanks!
Sun is out, I'm goin for it!
I need to finish one more memo and then will be up
Cool, I'll get on $ first so no hurry
...so much for that, couldn't catch dollar!
I will try to help when I get there leaving in 10
